properties.name: spring.jpa.database-platform
properties.description: Hibernate dialect class name. Used by Hibernate Reactive to determine SQL syntax.

properties.name: spring.jpa.hibernate.ddl-auto
properties.description: DDL mode (none, validate, update, create, create-drop). Default is 'none'.

properties.name: spring.jpa.show-sql
properties.description: Whether to enable logging of SQL statements. Default is false.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.format_sql
properties.description: Whether to format SQL output for better readability. Default is false.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.use_sql_comments
properties.description: Whether to add comments to SQL statements showing the origin query. Default is false.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.highlight_sql
properties.description: Whether to highlight SQL syntax in console output with ANSI colors. Default is false.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.default_batch_fetch_size
properties.description: Default batch size for fetching associations. Helps solve N+1 query problems.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.max_fetch_depth
properties.description: Maximum depth of outer join fetching for single-ended associations.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.jdbc.batch_size
properties.description: Maximum number of statements Hibernate will batch together before executing. Enables JDBC batching for better insert/update performance.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.jdbc.fetch_size
properties.description: JDBC fetch size hint. Determines how many rows are fetched from the database at once.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.order_inserts
properties.description: Whether to order SQL inserts by primary key value. Enables better batching but may have performance overhead. Default is false.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.order_updates
properties.description: Whether to order SQL updates by primary key value. Reduces deadlocks in concurrent systems but may have performance overhead. Default is false.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.jdbc.batch_versioned_data
properties.description: Whether to batch versioned data (optimistic locking). Should be false if JDBC driver returns incorrect row counts. Default is true.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.generate_statistics
properties.description: Whether to collect statistics for performance analysis. Default is false.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.query.plan_cache_max_size
properties.description: Maximum number of query plans to cache. Increase for better performance with many different queries. Default is 2048.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.query.fail_on_pagination_over_collection_fetch
properties.description: Whether to fail when pagination is applied to a query with collection fetch. Default is false.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.query.in_clause_parameter_padding
properties.description: Whether to pad IN clause parameters to power-of-2 sizes for better query plan caching. Default is false.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.globally_quoted_identifiers
properties.description: Whether to quote all database identifiers. Useful when using reserved words as column names. Default is false.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.physical_naming_strategy
properties.description: Fully qualified class name of the physical naming strategy. Controls how entity/property names are translated to database names.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.implicit_naming_strategy
properties.description: Fully qualified class name of the implicit naming strategy. Determines default names for database objects.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.jdbc.time_zone
properties.description: JDBC time zone for reading/writing timestamp values. Example: 'UTC', 'Asia/Seoul'.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.cache.use_second_level_cache
properties.description: Whether to enable the second-level cache. Requires a cache provider. Default is false.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.cache.use_query_cache
properties.description: Whether to enable the query cache. Requires second-level cache to be enabled. Default is false.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.reactive.pool-size
properties.description: Hibernate Reactive connection pool size. Unlike HikariCP, Hibernate Reactive uses its own connection pool.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.reactive.ssl-mode
properties.description: Vert.x PG Client SSL mode. For AWS RDS, use 'require'.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.reactive.connect-timeout
properties.description: Maximum wait time (ms) when requesting a connection from the pool. Timeout exception if exceeded.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.reactive.idle-timeout
properties.description: Maximum idle time (ms) for connections. Unused connections are removed from the pool after this time.

properties.name: spring.jpa.properties.hibernate.reactive.max-wait-queue-size
properties.description: Maximum size of the connection pool wait queue. Exception thrown immediately if queue is full.

values.description: Validate the schema, make no changes
Create the schema, destroying previous data
Create and then drop the schema when SessionFactory closes
Use SSL if server requires it
Try SSL first, fall back to non-encrypted
